long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy the convenience of hassle-free auto Right Click Absolute Enable Copy Extension. Seamlessly operating in the background, it effortlessly enables essential functions like select, copy, copy images, inspect, paste, etc., automatically upon activation on specific domains/web pages. No manual toggling needed - it's always primed to enhance your browsing experience with right-click functionality.

Furthermore, this extension adapts to all types of text styles and conditions, allowing you to copy and paste images as well as all sorts of content. When pasting within existing text, it seamlessly adopts the existing text style, color, size, shape, and more, ensuring a smooth integration of copied content.
